title: Middle Eastern funds are plowing billions of dollars into hottest AI start-ups
content: Oil-rich nations are turning from oil to artificial intelligence to diversify their economies.
summary: Oil-rich nations are turning from oil to artificial intelligence to diversify their economies.

title: Intel's wild week leaves Wall Street more uncertain than ever about chipmaker's future
content: Intel still makes the majority of processors at the heart of PCs, laptops, and servers, but that's not enough to appease investors.
summary: Intel still makes the majority of processors at the heart of PCs, laptops, and servers, but that's not enough to appease investors.

title: Asia-Pacific markets open lower after Federal Reserve rate cut optimism sent markets higher last week
content: Investors assessed Friday's monetary policy decisions from Japan and China and worries grow over the health of the Asian countries' economy.
summary: Investors assessed Friday's monetary policy decisions from Japan and China and worries grow over the health of the Asian countries' economy.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Recession concerns still linger
content: Last week’s burst of euphoria was mostly driven by anticipation and celebration of the Fed’s rate cut. Markets this week will look at the hard data coming out.
summary: Last week’s burst of euphoria was mostly driven by anticipation and celebration of the Fed’s rate cut. Markets this week will look at the hard data coming out.

title: Why EU tariffs are unlikely to dent Chinese EV makers' European expansion
content: To make the European market unattractive for Chinese EV exports, tariffs have to be as high as 50%, according to research group Rhodium.
summary: To make the European market unattractive for Chinese EV exports, tariffs have to be as high as 50%, according to research group Rhodium.

title: These are the 3 patterns of the ‘chronically single,’ says breakup expert
content: Amy Chan, 42, is the author of "Breakup Bootcamp: The Science of Rewiring Your Heart." She brought in over $200,000 in 2023 with her business.

title: Britain's ultra-wealthy are threatening to exit en masse ahead of proposed tax changes
content: Labour's plans to axe the U.K.'s non-dom tax regime could spark an ultra wealthy exodus, advisers and research bodies have warned.
summary: Labour's plans to axe the U.K.'s non-dom tax regime could spark an ultra wealthy exodus, advisers and research bodies have warned.

title: House Speaker Johnson axes Trump voting restrictions in new government funding bill
content: Congressional Democrats and Republicans have eight days to strike a funding deal before the government goes into a partial shutdown.
summary: Congressional Democrats and Republicans have eight days to strike a funding deal before the government goes into a partial shutdown.

title: Qualcomm recently approached Intel about a possible takeover
content: If Qualcomm were to acquire Intel, it would be one of the largest technology deals on record, but would first invite hefty regulatory scrutiny.
summary: If Qualcomm were to acquire Intel, it would be one of the largest technology deals on record, but would first invite hefty regulatory scrutiny.

title: Harris raised 4 times more than Trump in donations for final election sprint
content: Vice President Kamala Harris also raised $47 million in the 24 hours after the debate against Donald Trump.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris also raised $47 million in the 24 hours after the debate against Donald Trump.

title: Indian ed-tech startup Physics Wallah bags $2.8 billion valuation amid sector troubles
content: Physics Wallah CEO Alakh Pandey said the company would use the $210 million funding to expand its business and do acquisitions.
summary: Physics Wallah CEO Alakh Pandey said the company would use the $210 million funding to expand its business and do acquisitions.

title: American Airlines in talks to pick Citigroup over rival bank Barclays for crucial credit card deal, sources say
content: American has been working with banks and card networks on a new deal with the aim of consolidating its business with a single issuer, sources tell CNBC.
summary: American has been working with banks and card networks on a new deal with the aim of consolidating its business with a single issuer, sources tell CNBC.

title: Trump Media closes at a new 52-week low on heavy trading after lockup expires

title: Apple iPhone 16, Apple Watch Series 10 and AirPods 4 debut around the world

summary: Apple greeted customers at its stores around the world on Friday, for the debuts of the iPhone 16, Apple Watch Series 10 and AirPods 4.

title: Fed Governor Waller says inflation softening faster than he expected put him in half-point-cut camp
content: Waller told CNBC that the data is showing core inflation in the Fed's preferred measure is running below 1.8%

title: In U.S. trade war with China, Mexico is emerging as the big winner
content: A CNBC analysis of trade data reveals a multi-year surge in trade between China and Mexico helping manufacturers and the supply chain avoid Trump/Biden tariffs.
summary: A CNBC analysis of trade data reveals a multi-year surge in trade between China and Mexico helping manufacturers and the supply chain avoid Trump/Biden tariffs.

title: Europe automaker shares slump after Mercedes becomes latest to cut 2024 guidance
content: Mercedes shares fell more than 6% Friday after the German carmaker cut its 2024 guidance on the back of weaker demand from China.
summary: Mercedes shares fell more than 6% Friday after the German carmaker cut its 2024 guidance on the back of weaker demand from China.

title: Huawei's trifold phone is proving popular among Apple iPhone fans in Beijing
content: Out of 10 people CNBC talked to, eight said they are interested in both the new Huawei and Apple phones.

title: China unexpectedly leaves benchmark lending rates unchanged after Fed’s jumbo cut
content: The People's Bank of China (PBOC) said it would keep the one-year loan prime rate (LPR) at 3.35%, as well as the five-year LPR at 3.85%.
summary: The People's Bank of China (PBOC) said it would keep the one-year loan prime rate (LPR) at 3.35%, as well as the five-year LPR at 3.85%.

title: Constellation Energy to restart Three Mile Island nuclear plant, sell the power to Microsoft for AI
content: Constellation described the agreement with Microsoft as the largest power purchase agreement that the nuclear plant operator has ever signed.
summary: Constellation described the agreement with Microsoft as the largest power purchase agreement that the nuclear plant operator has ever signed.

title: Nike CEO John Donahoe is out, replaced by company veteran Elliott Hill
content: Nike CEO John Donahoe will retire from the company in October. He will be succeeded by company veteran Elliott Hill.
summary: Nike CEO John Donahoe will retire from the company in October. He will be succeeded by company veteran Elliott Hill.

title: Bank of Japan keeps key interest rate steady as it treads cautiously on normalizing policy
content: The decision came as the central bank seeks to wean its economy off the long-held ultra-easy monetary policy and curb the yen's slide against the U.S. dollar.
summary: The decision came as the central bank seeks to wean its economy off the long-held ultra-easy monetary policy and curb the yen's slide against the U.S. dollar.

title: Companies face risk of huge fines and suspensions under tough new cyber rules in the EU

title: The Fed has set out on a 'recalibration' of policy. Here's what Powell's new buzzword means

title: CNBC's Inside India newsletter: Will India's lofty manufacturing ambitions bear fruit?
